skills.name: Monkey Wand
skills.description: Attacks with the Monkey Wand and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Dark Monkey Wand
skills.description: Attacks and decreases the Defense for 2 turns with a 75% chance. The attack power increases as your HP decreases.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-4.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's current HP % in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Current HP %</mark> + 11.2)

skills.name: Summon Clouds
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a giant storm cloud to decrease their Defense for 2 turns and stuns them for 1 turn with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill will increase according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.7*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
